title: (x) Men and Boys Retreat neon-type script - Farlow {Yves, Sebastian}
content:
Camping! Story time! Roasting weenies!

Does anyone recognize this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013021im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font%20question_5621.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Tidy" font from Moo.com - Hypatia {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013021/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47974 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Native Sun logo condensed didone - Poster Bodoni Comp {Naoise Ó Conchubhair} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013021/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47997 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jrgott

comments.content: So it is. Thanks for your time and knowledge!
Five minutes of our time is barely worth mentioning, but much appreciated all the same. ;^)
